item.description:
So close to the fireworks that you can smell it. The fireworks starts at 8:15 PM.
We can meet 5:00 pm and check out the annual sea food fest. Enjoy lobster rolls, raw oysters, fried clams and more.

Park at the satellite parking lots - it's free parking and free shuttle.

Getting there - We recommend carpooling. Please note if you need a ride and where you are located and which T stop you can meet at. And if you can provide a carpool ride please note the same info. Gas prices are high so we suggest a carpool fee of $13/person for gas and tolls. Please pay to the driver.

 

Check out the website below,
and Under Festival Overview, Directions, Parking & Free Shuttle
(yeah, a lot of people, take the free shuttle)

http://www.hamptonbeachseafoodfestival.com/index.cfm
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance to the seafoodfest. And we'll provide cell # that you can call or text if needed.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Hampton Beach Seafood Festival + Fireworks
